messages.subject: Re: Kogatana
messages.msgSnippet: ... I have one that is extremely similar.  Would love to compare notes on it (eg- how is yours tempered?) and would especially love to know if somehow knows
messages.messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "excelsiorilluminati"
<excelsiorilluminati@...> wrote:
>
> Hi All, Could someone assist me in translating the inscription on a
> kogatana I have. It comes out of a quality kozuka and has signs of
> quality itself. It has an hamon, hardened edge and yasurime. As well
> it has a mark like an arsenal mark though I don't study in that
> period. Thanks, John picture at : Johns stuff title : Kogatana
>
I have one that is extremely similar. Would love to compare notes on
it (eg- how is yours tempered?) and would especially love to know if
somehow knows how to verify if it is real? I was told that the
kotetsu taikan has pics of some kogatana in it.
Thanks
Kirk

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Kogatana
messages.msgSnippet: Reading more into this John and Barry, I believe it is Nagasone Kotetsu Nidaimei Okimasa. He is recorded as signing this way in Nihonto Koza but there are no
messages.messageBody:
Reading more into this John and Barry, I believe it is Nagasone Kotetsu
Nidaimei Okimasa. He is recorded as signing this way in Nihonto Koza but
there are no oshigata for that mei. Maybe someone else has one. I will
keep looking.

Rich

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Kogatana
messages.msgSnippet: Hi John. I have a partial reading ( I posted on NMB ) . With the hollyhock mon and starting with Nagasone Minamoto and ending with Okimasa and Kao (?????) , it
messages.messageBody:
Hi John. I have a partial reading ( I posted on NMB ) .

With the hollyhock mon and starting with Nagasone Minamoto and ending
with Okimasa and Kao (?????) , it could be very good if genuine. I am
not sure on the rest of the mei. I will look through my references to
see if I have a Kao for him. I have been studying the Nagosone line a
lot recently and I may have a Wakizashi by either Okihisa or Okinao and
am looking closely at that line.

Cheers

Rich

messages.subject: Kogatana
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, Could someone assist me in translating the inscription on a kogatana I have. It comes out of a quality kozuka and has signs of quality itself. It has
messages.messageBody:
Hi All, Could someone assist me in translating the inscription on a
kogatana I have. It comes out of a quality kozuka and has signs of
quality itself. It has an hamon, hardened edge and yasurime. As well
it has a mark like an arsenal mark though I don't study in that
period. Thanks, John picture at : Johns stuff title : Kogatana
